about-description-1: I'm passionate about creating useful applications — both as a Developer and as a Project Manager. I really enjoy working in a team; the best projects are created when we join forces and work together.
about-description-2: I am a student of Systems Engineering at the Wrocław University of Science and Technology, where I develop both my technical and organizational skills.
about-description-3: Outside of IT, I am interested in history, I read fantasy and political fiction, and I spend my free time playing strategy games and RPGs — especially those from CD Projekt Red.
wmsdev-description-1: I am an active developer, Project Manager, and co-president of the WMS_DEV student scientific club at my university.
wmsdev-description-2: We create web applications for students, using the latest technologies and working in the Scrum methodology.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description: Professional farmers calculate the profitability of planned crops, considering all revenues and costs. This calculator makes the process intuitive. Created for topagrar.pl.

wms-dev-description: Homepage of the WMS_DEV student scientific club at my university — Wrocław University of Science and Technology. This is a team project, in which I serve as Project Manager and Frontend Developer.
wms-dev-click: Check out the code created by the team of epic developers from WMS_DEV.
porownywarka-odmian-description: The economic success of crop production depends on choosing the right variety. This application helps interpret large public databases (source: COBORU). It makes sorting and comparing data much easier than in Excel.
porownywarka-odmian-click: Click below to see the application.
kalkulator-rozpylaczy-description: Plant protection treatments require selecting the correct pressure, speed, and liquid dose. The result is a specific spray tip (a replaceable machine part identified by number and color). This tool suggests which spray tip to choose and how to set the operating parameters.
kalkulator-rozpylaczy-click: Click below to see the application.
arvalis-description: A technology demonstrator for the Arvalis Institute. Created on the basis of a table from www.arvalis.fr. It allows quick estimation of wheat lodging risk depending on soil, variety, nitrogen fertilization, and biomass at the end of the tillering stage.
